transport.question: I have wheels and go 'Vroom Vroom!' What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I can take you to the park.
🛣️ I drive on the road.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Sometimes a family rides in me.

transport.question: I float on the water and carry people. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need water to move.
⚓ I can be very big or small.
👨‍✈️ A captain drives me.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
🛬 I land at an airport.
🌍 I can take you to a different country.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 You wear a helmet when you ride me.
🔔 I have a bell to ring.
👧 Boys and girls can ride me.

transport.question: I go on tracks and carry many people at once. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a special path.
🚏 People wait for me at a station.
💨 I can be very long.

transport.question: I am big and yellow and take children to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I have a stop sign that comes out.
🎒 Children carry backpacks when they ride me.
🎶 You might sing songs on me.

transport.question: I help people who are hurt and have a loud siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I make a 'wee-ooh' sound.
🏥 I can take you to the hospital.
🚑 I have a red cross on my side.

transport.question: I am a car that helps catch bad guys. What am I?

hints.text: 👮 I have a siren and flashing lights.
🚨 The police drive me.
🚓 I might have a cage in the back.

transport.question: I can fly to the moon and back. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very fast and powerful.
👨‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
🌕 I go very far away.

transport.question: I fly but have blades instead of wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I spin around to fly.
🏞️ I can land in small spaces.
🚨 Sometimes I am used to help people.
🥛 We get milk from this animal.
🌱 I eat grass in the field.
⚫ I have black and white spots.

animal.question: I wag my tail and bark. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to play fetch.
🏡 I protect your house.
🐾 I have four legs and fur.

animal.question: I go quack and like to swim. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am often yellow when I am young.
🌊 I love to play in puddles.
🗣️ My babies are called ducklings.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am the largest land animal.
🦣 My nose is very long and helpful.

animal.question: I meow and like to chase mice. Who am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🐈 I purr when I am happy.
🥛 I drink milk.

animal.question: I hop around and love carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I like to eat vegetables from the garden.
🐰 I have long ears.
🐾 I have a fluffy tail.

animal.question: I roar and I'm the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a big mane.
🦁 I live in Africa.
🥩 I am a carnivore.

animal.question: I swing from trees and eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I like to chatter and play.
🌴 I live in the jungle.
🐾 I have a long tail to help me balance.

animal.question: I have a shell on my back and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I like to eat lettuce.
🥬 I carry my home with me.
☀️ I love to bask in the sun.

animal.question: I slither and have no legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 Some of us are poisonous.
🌿 I like to hide in tall grass.
👅 I flick my tongue to smell.
